channel.title: Ok...how to i set a max player that works
channel.description:
i tried playerhandler.java using this- [code] public static final int maxPlayers = 20;[/code] whenever more than 20 players... it just crashes....
i tried this in server.java- [code] public static int MaxConnections = 20;[/code] guess what. it makes no difference.
is there a way to put max players 20 other than these that acctually works?

item.title: Ok...how to i set a max player that works

it dosent work tho the top one just crashes and the bottom one dosent do anything

item.title: Ok...how to i set a max player that works
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Yes.
That means it’s worked.
If you don’t want more that 20 people on you’ve got to set that to 20.
For more, set it to the most amout.

Read full topic

	public static final int maxPlayers = 20;

whenever more than 20 players… it just crashes…

guess what. it makes no difference.

is there a way to put max players 20 other than these that acctually works?
